User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:7.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0.1
Build ID: 20110928134238

Steps to reproduce:

I have 7 email accounts at work that I monitor, including 2 I send from, plus a couple of personal ones. I forwarded an email from my primary work address.



Actual results:

The sender was changed to another work address. 

Example: Let's say I have me@work.com and documentation@work.com, both using mail.work.com for both receiving and sending mail. I receive a message on me@work.com, read it in my inbox, and forward it to someone. The forward is from documentation@work.com.
This behaviour is quite consistent.


Expected results:

The sender on a forward should be the account on which the email was received.
comments.creator: martin.a.wills@gmail.com
comments.author: martin.a.wills@gmail.com
